Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
What does "Brexit" mean for young people?
In the EU referendum, 75% of 18-25s voted to remain in the European Union. However now that Britian has voted to Leave, the new Prime Minister will need to negotiate with the EU to shape what our new relationship with Europe will look like. This will involve many things that affect young people's lives and futures.
Livity (a youth marketing agency) are looking for young people help create a national campaign in response to the EU referendum result and make Brexit as positive as possible for young people and to ensure that young people's views, demands and ideas are fully represented in the negotiations.
Wednesday 27th of July, Thursday 28th of July and/or Friday 29th of July from 14:00 - 19:00.
11, 9 Brighton Terrace, Brixton, London SW9 8DJ, UK
If you are interested do get in touch by calling 020 7326 5979 or email elspeth@livity.co.uk
Young, Professional and Employable with Goldman Sachs
Get involved in our next amazing workshops in partnership with investment banking firm Goldman Sachs and learn a whole host of important employability skills!
Customer Service and Clients
Wednesday 27th of July
Learn from professionals about what makes a good salesperson, how to adapt your style to suit different industries, and learn about the psychology around selling a product! You will also have a mock job interview and be involved in a mock assessment event for you will get individual feedback on how to improve your interviewing style!
Leadership and Problem Solving
Wednesday 3rd of August
Outstanding leadership skills are vital when working in a team environment and when trying to get people involved in a particular project - whether in school or in work. Get involved and learn a range of leadership and management techniques and how to inspire and motivate a group. Finally we will get you involved in a range of typical assessment sessions based around leadership and problem solving and teach you how to excel!
